 log legend:  0001=opened the pipes  0010= x received and error computed  0011 = x exceed upper bound  0100= x exceed lower bound  0101= x sended to inspect  0110= z received and error computed  0111= z exceed upper bound  1000= z exceed the lower bound  1001= z sended to the inspect  1010= selet sucseed  1011= select timer elapsed before receiving data.    the log number with an e in front means the relative operation failed,0.00E+00;
